testcase.name: should return true when field value EQUALS provided value
should return false when field value does NOT EQUAL provided value
should return true when field value NOT_EQUALS provided value
should return false when field value EQUALS provided value for NOT_EQUALS condition
should return true when all AND conditions match
should return false when one of the AND conditions fails
should return true when one of the OR conditions matches
should return false when none of the OR conditions match
should return true for complex nested conditions
should return false for complex nested conditions when inner condition fails
